trans-unit.source: Exposes properties that contain federation settings that control the behavior of the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>) in web applications.
trans-unit.target: 公開屬性，其中包含控制行為的 WS-同盟驗證模組的同盟設定 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) 和工作階段驗證模組 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>) 在 web 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: By default web applications have a single FederationConfiguration object that is accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設 web 應用程式具有單一的 FederationConfiguration 物件透過存取<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The first time the property is accessed a new FederationConfiguration instance is initialized from settings in the configuration file and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 第一次在屬性經過存取新的 FederationConfiguration 執行個體初始化從組態檔中設定和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName>就會引發事件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the properties and methods exposed by the FederationConfiguration class to modify or replace the object initialized from configuration in an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的屬性和 FederationConfiguration 類別所公開的方法來修改或取代從事件處理常式中的組態初始化物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is available through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property inside the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 此物件是透過<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>事件處理常式內部的屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> class by loading settings from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel.services" name="system.identityModel.services" href=""></xref> section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref>類別載入設定從<xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel.services" name="system.identityModel.services" href=""></xref>組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: The properties in the new instance are initialized by loading settings from the `<system.identityModel.services>` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 中的新執行個體的屬性會初始化所載入的設定`<system.identityModel.services>`組態區段。

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor with the `loadConfig` parameter `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>具有建構函式`loadConfig`參數`true`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > Before the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A> method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING] > 新<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A>方法，以確保執行個體已正確初始化。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> class by optionally loading settings from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel.services" name="system.identityModel.services" href=""></xref> section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref>類別會選擇性地載入設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel.services" name="system.identityModel.services" href=""></xref>組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > Before the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A> method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING]> 之前新<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A>方法，以確保執行個體已正確初始化。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The `system.identityModel` section must be specified in a `<section>` element under the `<configSections>` element in the configuration file or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: `system.identityModel`中必須指定區段`<section>`項目底下`<configSections>`擲回例外狀況的組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: ``` <configSections> <section name="system.identityModel" type="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelSection, System.IdentityModel, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=B77A5C561934E089" /> </configSections> ``` If `loadConfig` is `true` and only a single `<federationConfiguration>` element is specified, settings are loaded using that element.
trans-unit.target: ``` <configSections> <section name="system.identityModel" type="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelSection, System.IdentityModel, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=B77A5C561934E089" /> </configSections> ```如果`loadConfig`是`true`和只有一個`<federationConfiguration>`指定項目，則使用該元素載入設定。

trans-unit.source: If multiple `<federationConfiguration>` elements are specified, the method attempts to load settings from the element that is unnamed of that has the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.DefaultFederationConfigurationName>.
trans-unit.target: 若為多個`<federationConfiguration>`指定項目，則方法會嘗試載入未命名的項目中設定具有<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.DefaultFederationConfigurationName>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.DefaultFederationConfigurationName>

trans-unit.source: If such an element does not exist, the method returns without loading settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果這類項目不存在，則方法會傳回而不載入設定。

trans-unit.source: This results in an exception when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致例外狀況時<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > Microsoft recommends that if you specify multiple `<federationConfiguration>` elements in the `system.identityModel.services` configuration section that at least one of them is unnamed or has its name set to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING] > Microsoft 建議，如果您指定多個`<federationConfiguration>`中的項目`system.identityModel.services`組態區段的至少其中一個未命名或其名稱設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to initialize with settings loaded from the configuration file; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to initialize to default values.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用的設定初始化載入從組態檔。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>將初始化為預設值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel" name="system.identityModel" href=""></xref> configuration section is not defined in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel" name="system.identityModel" href=""> </xref>組態檔中未定義組態區段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> class from the [\<federationConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CfederationConfiguration%3E.md) element with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref>類別從[ \< federationConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CfederationConfiguration%3E.md)具有指定名稱的項目。

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > Before the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A> method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING]> 之前新<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A>方法，以確保執行個體已正確初始化。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is called then a `<system.identityModel.services>` configuration section with a `<federationConfiguration>` element that has the specified name must exist in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 如果在呼叫這個建構函式則`<system.identityModel.services>`組態區段`<federationConfiguration>`具有指定的名稱的項目必須在組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Both the `system.identityModel` section and the `system.identityModel.services` must be specified in a `<section>` elements under the `<configSections>` element in the configuration file or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個`system.identityModel`區段和`system.identityModel.services`中必須指定`<section>`下的項目`<configSections>`擲回例外狀況的組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element from which to load the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref>要從中載入的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: There is no <xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel.services" name="system.identityModel.services" href=""></xref> section defined in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何<xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel.services" name="system.identityModel.services" href=""></xref>組態檔中定義的區段。

trans-unit.source: -or- There is no <xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel" name="system.identityModel" href=""></xref> section defined in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: -或-沒有任何<xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel" name="system.identityModel" href=""></xref>組態檔中定義的區段。

trans-unit.source: -or- There is no <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element with the specified name in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel.services" name="system.identityModel.services" href=""></xref> section.
trans-unit.target: -或-沒有任何<xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref>中指定之名稱的項目<xref uid="langword_csharp_system.identityModel.services" name="system.identityModel.services" href=""> </xref> > 一節。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cookie handler to be used by the Session Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定工作階段驗證模組所使用的 cookie 處理常式 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>)。

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler to be used by the Session Authentication Module (SAM).
trans-unit.target: 使用工作階段驗證模組 (SAM) cookie 處理常式。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom XML element, if any, present in this configuration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂的 XML 項目，如果任何項目，顯示在此設定。

trans-unit.source: The custom XML element.
trans-unit.target: 自訂的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: Defines the name of the default [\<federationConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CfederationConfiguration%3E.md) element from which settings should be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 定義的預設名稱[ \< federationConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CfederationConfiguration%3E.md)應該載入的設定項目。

trans-unit.source: This is an empty string as the default element is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: 這會是空字串，因為未命名的預設項目。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration"></xref> object associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration"></xref>與這個執行個體相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: When initialized from a configuration file, this property is set by the [\<identityConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CidentityConfiguration%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 當初始化從組態檔，這個屬性由設定[ \< identityConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CidentityConfiguration%3E.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: The identity configuration object associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體相關聯的身分識別設定物件。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化目前的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method ensures that the current instance is properly initialized before it is used by the HTTP Modules to process incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可確保目前的執行個體已正確初始化後，會由 HTTP 模組用來處理傳入的要求。

trans-unit.source: It should only be called once.
trans-unit.target: 它應該只呼叫一次。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IsInitialized%2A> property before calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IsInitialized%2A>屬性，才能呼叫方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IsInitialized%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IsInitialized%2A> property is set `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IsInitialized%2A>屬性設定`true`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IsInitialized%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates a default cookie handler if there is not one already configured through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.CookieHandler%2A> property and calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.Initialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the identity configuration object that is configured through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IdentityConfiguration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會建立預設 cookie 處理常式，如果有不是其中一個已設定透過<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.CookieHandler%2A>屬性和呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.Initialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>身分識別設定物件上的方法，透過設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IdentityConfiguration%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IdentityConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.Initialize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.CookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to modify this behavior or to provide additional initialization in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫這個方法來修改此行為或提供額外的初始化衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: This method should be invoked before the class is used by the HTTP Modules to process incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: 類別可由 HTTP 模組來處理傳入的要求之前，應叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The current instance has already been initialized (The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IsInitialized*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.)
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體已經初始化 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IsInitialized*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.IsInitialized*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize*>呼叫方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize*>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來檢查是否<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>物件已經初始化。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A> method should be called once and only once.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A>應該只有一次呼叫方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `set` operation is `protected`.
trans-unit.target: `set`作業`protected`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration object has been configured; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已設定的組態物件。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the properties for the current instance from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 從組態檔載入目前的執行個體的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by constructors that initialize the newly created <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> from configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新建立的建構函式會呼叫這個方法<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref>從組態設定。

trans-unit.source: The LoadConfiguration method is called by the constructors to set the properties of the newly created <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object from the specified `<federationConfiguration>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定新建立之屬性的建構函式會呼叫 LoadConfiguration 方法<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>從指定的物件`<federationConfiguration>`項目。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: If `element` is `null`, the instance is loaded with default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果`element`是`null`，預設值載入執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the there is no configuration file, or, if the named section does not exist, then no exception is thrown, instead the instance is loaded with default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有組態檔，或如果具名的區段不存在，則任何例外狀況會擲回，改為執行個體載入具有預設值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element to load settings from.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""> </xref>来載入的設定項目。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to load default values.
trans-unit.target: 可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>載入預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個執行個體相關聯的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `name` attribute of a [\<federationConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CfederationConfiguration%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 對應至`name`屬性[ \< federationConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CfederationConfiguration%3E.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: The name associated with this federation configuration instance.
trans-unit.target: 與這個同盟設定執行個體相關聯的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X.509 certificate used to sign WS-Federation protocol messages.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來簽署 WS-同盟通訊協定訊息的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: When initialized from a configuration file, this property is set by the [\<serviceCertificate\>](../Topic/%3CserviceCertificate%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 當初始化從組態檔，這個屬性由設定[ \< serviceCertificate\>](../Topic/%3CserviceCertificate%3E.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate used to sign WS-Federation protocol messages.
trans-unit.target: X.509 憑證，用來簽署 WS-同盟通訊協定訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the configuration settings for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 WS-同盟驗證模組的組態設定 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>)。

trans-unit.source: When initialized from a configuration file, this property is set by the [\<wsFederation\>](../Topic/%3CwsFederation%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 當初始化從組態檔，這個屬性由設定[ \< wsFederation\>](../Topic/%3CwsFederation%3E.md)項目。

trans-unit.source: The configuration settings for the WS-Federation Authentication Module.
trans-unit.target: WS-同盟驗證模組組態設定。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ，就會發生。
